kamarawath athata gaththa mama owun siti thanata giya.gihin ithama aacharashiliwa badhawak karanawa nan samawenna kiyala ehema me eluwa palahime wistharaya asa sitiya.ma balaporoththu nowu aakarayata owun ma samaga itha suhadawa katha kala athara kipa denekma ma asu wistharaya kiyannata idiripath wuna.owuna ki aakarayata kulubadu thunapaha lunu aadiya yedu eluwa eeyam kolawala otha paya thuna hamarak hatharak pamana palaha gannawa.miris yodanne nathi bawath ee wenuwata gammiris kudu pawichchi karana bawath owun wadiduratath kiya sitiya.

wyaja rupiyal 5000 mudal nottu sansaranaya wadiwimak athi bawa polis madhya prakashaka niyojya polispathi ajith rohana mahatha pawasanawa.ohu pawasanne pasugiya dina kihipaya pura diwayine wiwidha pradesha walin rupiyal 5000 wyaja mudal nottu bhawitha kirimata uthsaha kala pudgalayin saha rupiyal pandahase wyaja nottu mudranaya kala pudgalayin kihipa denek athadanguwata gath  bawayi.elambaena uthsawa samayedi rupiyal pandahase wyaja nottu wadiwashayen welandapolata idiripath kirimata idakada athi nisa mudal ganudenu kirimedi wisheshayenma rupiyal pandahase nottuwa pilibanda wadi awadhanayak yomu karana lesayi ohu wadi duratath sandahan karanne.me athara eeye dinaye kolambaa blumandal pradeshayedi welandasalakata rupiyal 5000 wyaja nottu dekak ragena pamini pudgalayan dedeneku athadanguwata gaththa.athadanguwata gath pudgalayin gen sidu kala prashna kirimwala di thawath rupiyal 5000ye wyaja nottu hatharak athadanguwata ganimata haki wi thibenawa.me pilibandawa wadidura wimarshana sidukaranne kolambaa aparadha wimarshana eekakaya wisin.
